status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"723re","text":"Seed the HeLa cells the day before the treatment day in 24 well plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fgek","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"au24s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"en64a","text":"Each well contained 0.5 ml of growth media; 120,000 cells were seeded for penta KO expressing BFP-Parkin, mito-Keima (mtKeima) and GFP-OPTN or -NDP52; the number of cells of other cell lines were adjusted so that the next day they are all in similar confluency with penta KO expressing BFP-Parkin, mtKeima and GFP-OPTN or -NDP52.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5n4kh","text":"The next day, make sure the seeded cells are spreading out.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd84e","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9r30b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"elsi9","text":"Not concentrated in the middle of the well because this can affect the results.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e79dq","text":"Aspirate off the old media and treat each well with   of growth media containing   Antimycin A,   Oligomycin and   QVD for indicated times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":52,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":81,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":96,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":113,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fu2t3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"27c3m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"B1587400072211ED853B75663D556270","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"4","error_concentration":false,"guid":"BB3664A0072211ED853B75663D556270","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"C62465B0072211ED853B75663D556270","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"CEF13470072211ED853B75663D556270","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"4":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"940jd","text":"Make sure all drugs are vortexed well, mix the media well after adding each drug.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8kb5l","text":"2 hours prior to harvesting, feed the untreated wells with   of warm growth media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"08E68BD0072311ED853B75663D556270","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1q3hv","text":"Resuspend the cell pellets in   of FACS buffer, transfer to pre-chilled FACS tubes and keep the samples   in the dark for analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":104,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"rvji","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"937D8500072311ED853B75663D556270","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"77C50E2007A311EDAAB31DDF1CC6FBBB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5qn7i","text":"Aspirate 1x PBS and add   of trypsin and incubate at   for  - .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":59,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6qqpe","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ca8f6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"437DA170072311ED853B75663D556270","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"524AFF90072311ED853B75663D556270","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"5C0F26A0072311ED853B75663D556270","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"5FF95920072311ED853B75663D556270","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9ojfe","text":"Check under microscope to make sure all the cells were trypsinised properly.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pqvr","text":"Wash the wells with   of 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bt71v","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f541p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"20F684F0072311ED853B75663D556270","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5mjed","text":"Make sure swirl around after adding the PBS to wash the cells properly.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5efaf","text":"Mix well with a P1000 and transfer the cells to cold eppies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cciot","text":"Control cells include unstained cells (without any fluorescence proteins), cells that only express GFP-OPTN or GFP-NDP52 (to set up compensation so that GFP signal doesn’t bleach into mtKeima signal.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Mito-Keima assay to assess mitophagy
